about_the_game:
MineGeon: Renegades is an action roguelite focused on resource gathering, set on the mysterious planet PAIMO. As part of a group of cosmic renegades, your mission is to explore dangerous, deep dungeons—either solo or with friends—to extract valuable minerals while facing hordes of enemies and uncovering hidden secrets. Each run offers a unique experience with procedurally generated dungeons and ever-changing challenges. Upgrade your skills, discover legendary weapons, and face formidable bosses alongside your companions.

DESCEND WITH FRIENDS

Up to three players or solo to explore the depths of PAIMO together. Coordinate your moves, combine skills and gadgets, and share the treasures you find along the way. Teamwork is essential to survive the deadliest challenges, but watch your back—sometimes, you’ll need to unleash your inner renegade and work alone to maximize rewards.

MASTER POWERFUL GADGETS

You'll find gadgets that will transform your playstyle. These gadgets, like grenades, energy shields, combat drones, and more, offer a variety of upgrades to aid you in battle. Some gadgets have offensive effects, while others provide defensive abilities. Each gadget can be the difference between life and death on PAIMO.

GATHER YOUR MINERALS

PAIMO is filled with rare and valuable minerals that bring out your inner renegade. As you delve deeper into the dungeons, you’ll find various types of minerals that can be traded to upgrade your weapons, skills, and gadgets back in New Olympia. You'll need to be strategic about when to use these minerals, as once you die, they’re gone for good.

FACE CHALLENGING ENEMIES

The biomes of PAIMO are teeming with diverse enemies, from minor creatures to towering bosses. Throughout your journey, you'll encounter the Scavengers, rival mercenaries equipped with advanced gear. Each biome culminates in a battle against a Boss—an ancient entity that will test your skills and strategies to the limit.

UPGRADE AND PROGRESS

In MineGeon: Renegades, progression is key to your survival and success. As you explore and gather resources, you can upgrade your skills and equipment to become stronger with each run. Invest in permanent upgrades for the mines on your ship, unlock new abilities for your renegade, and strengthen your arsenal with the powerful weapons of the Ancient Ones.

CHOOSE YOUR RENEGADE

Choose from four unique classes, each with its own abilities, weapons, and playstyle. From the resilient Tank to the deadly Gunslinger, each class offers a different experience in combat. Upgrade your character throughout the game and unlock ultimate abilities that can turn the tide of battle. Find your role within the team and combine forces with other renegades to maximize your chances of survival on PAIMO.

Get ready to dive into the universe's most dangerous depths with your fellow renegades! Forge your path, gather power, and survive the impossible. The chaos of PAIMO awaits, filled with relentless enemies, ancient secrets, and epic loot!

Do you have what it takes to emerge victorious from the mines and become a legend? Add MineGeon: Renegades to your wishlist and join the adventure of the cosmic renegades. The fate of the galaxy is in your hands!

name: MineGeon: Renegades

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU or better (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 / Radeon HD 5870 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: Descend into Planet Paimo in MineGeon: Renegades, a chaotic multiplayer roguelite where you choose your renegade, delve into the minegeons, and battle unique enemies across diverse biomes. Fight, gather, improve, and die to uncover the secrets of Paimo and New Olympia.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
